data.prayer: Lord, make the 38,343 believers in Kirovohrad to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 1,019,656 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kirovohrad, Ukraine
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Kirovohrad, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 27 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 38,343 believers living in Kirovohrad, Ukraine.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Kirovohrad, Ukraine.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Adyghe people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, you gave the church of Kirovohrad, Ukraine the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Kirovohrad, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Kirovohrad that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

location.name: Kirovohrad
location.people_groups_list: Orochi, Thai, Kyrgyz, Tatar, Crimean, Kazakh
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Orochi (900), Thai (3,800), Kyrgyz (1,000), Tatar, Crimean (292,000), Kazakh (5,000)
